thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Loretta

author: Loretta
title: Loretta
text:
There is no place better then B & H!!! Every order is always in prefect condition, delivered next day (if order Monday though Thursday by 4pm and if there is no other exception).
If I have any questions they always have the time of day for you on the phone. You can't beat them....Your CRAZY if you go any where else!!!
B & H ROCKS!!!! Loretta & Mike Loyal Customers since 2014
